snippet: President Asif Ali Zardari’s Pakistan Peoples Party portrayed the attack in Karachi  as a warning to the president.
abstract: Bilal Sheikh, chief security officer of Pakistani Pres Asif Ali Zardari, is killed in a bombing in port city Karachi, raising concerns about vulnerability of even senior officials to attack by militants.
lead_paragraph: President Asif Ali Zardari’s Pakistan Peoples Party portrayed the attack in Karachi  as a warning to the president.

headline.main: Bombing Kills Top Security Aide to Pakistan President
headline.print_headline:
Pakistan: President’s Security Chief
Is Killed in Marketplace Bombing
